text: Radwan Talib Husayn Ismail al-Hamduni (d. 2014), known as Abu Jurnas, was a senior Islamic State leader.https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/middleeast/iraq/10956193/Revealed- the-Islamic-State-cabinet-from-finance-minister-to-suicide-bomb-deployer.html ==History== He was imprisoned in Camp Bucca at some point.http://www.newsmax.com/Newsfront/ISIS-Iraq-military-detainment- camps/2014/10/16/id/601156/ He served as governor of the Islamic State's 'border province' and was IS emir of Mosul.http://www.longwarjournal.org/archives/2014/12/us_kills_islamic_sta.php ==Death== He was killed November 2014 in Mosul.http://www.haaretz.com/middle- east-news/1.627572http://edition.cnn.com/2014/12/18/politics/u-s-air-strikes- kill-3-high-level-isis-leaders/ ==References== Category:2014 deaths Category:Iraqi Muslims Category:Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant members
title: Abu Jurnas
